modName: WEARS - Overhaul - 20 Mods for Skyrim - English
summary: This is the English traduction of all "USURE" mods in one Overhaul.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]*********************************************
*** Welcome to W.E.A.R.S. ***
*********************************************
[/size][/center]
[center][size=3]*** a [/size][size=6]W[/size][size=4]ay to [/size][size=6]E[/size][size=4]volutive [/size][size=6]A[/size][size=4]bilities and [/size][size=6]R[/size][size=4]eality for [/size][size=6]S[/size][size=4]kyrim ***
*
*
[u][u]CONTEXT[/u] OF CREATION:[/u][/size][size=4][u]
[/u]
The mods of serie "WEARS" is a french project that is trying to give to Skyrim from Elder Scrolls, the minimum of constraints that is needed by the game not to be boring but challenging !!
As I tryed Skyrim for the first time, I found the game to tidy, to polished, to easy: At level 30, possessing all the horses, all the same (except color !), all the full houses of all the towns, my own coffers full with 30.000 gold. Antic Skelettons with just new weapons and new armors, followers who are giving their lifes for you because you gave a letter to somebody..
That was just something ridiculous !

Just enjoy WEARS which is changing little bit of this: Adding Needs, Evolution in many things that the player has now to regulate.
As I promised this serie now in English.[/size]

[size=4][u]INSTALLATION:

[/u]- Read this first[/size]
[size=4]- Requires last Skse !!
- Start a new game !!
- Open after Intro MCM Menu to check/uncheck your own configuration.

[u]THE MODS / FEATURES[/u]

1) Degradation:

- Latest original traduction of Degradation Mod from Marcoousik.
- [u]Reveal your Armours and Weapons[/u] by equiping them as you'll fin them as [unknown] or [new] in the world.

- [u]Items will degrade[/u]: First, losing their tempered quality (exquisite, superior, fine...)
- Second: Degrading their value until zero value in Fight !
Degrading depends on wearing or fighting, heavy hit or not, blocked or not and so on...

[u]Repair your items[/u]:
- Approach a grindstone or workbench to enter in a mode marked with a smithy sound.
-> Open your inventory an select all weapons (at grindstone) and armours (at workbench) to get the repair Menu opened for the damaged item.

-> Or: Activte the Grinstone or workbench:
Get a list of all weapons and armours that are in your inventory and that need repairing.
Choose from a menu those that you want to get repaired.

-> On your way, use Smith Hammer: Equip them, enable repair mode from your inventory, or get the lists of damaged weapons and armours.

- Check MCM Menu for own Configuration.


[b][u][size=4]2) TRAVELLING:[/size]
[/u][/b]
- travel will cost you more septims. Configure this in MCM Menu.
Travel new cost: 50 septims / 100 septims.
[u][b][size=4]
3) LES TORCHS:
[/size][/b][/u]
- Make your own torchs at Smithy !
- 2 Versions: With Troll fat or without.
- Configurable in MCM

[b][u][size=4]4) SILENT FIGHT:[/size]
[/u][/b]
- Enable or disable the fight Cries as player is moving weapons.
- Configurable en MCM

[size=4][b][u]5) REDUXCOSTMAGIE[/u][/b]
[/size]
- As Vanilla magicka is frustrating because 2 spells cost all your reserve:
Now reduced mana cost for spells
- Configurable in MCM: Magicka recovery 2 more rapidly or not.

[size=4][b][u]6) ALDUINS NIGHTMARE[/u][/b][/size]

- Alduin will track you now !
As you are his enemy, Alduin will track during the Mainquest hunting you like in Helgen with others dragons or draugr creatures.
- Configure as you want in MCM Menu.

[size=4][u][b]7) FOLLOWERS PAID:[/b][/u][/size]

- Pay now your followers 100 septims for 2 days work.
- Buy dogs at farmers and feed them.
- Three followers can go with you + 1 dog + 1 horse. 
- Open book in your inventory:
- Disable immediatly your follower (good when bug!)
- Call Dog or Horse or Follower immediatly back to you, good when you don't know where they are. 
- The folllowers want recover health as they fall in bleeding while fighting. So why the ennemy just don't kill them ? Stupid. So they will stay bleeding until fighting is ending.
- Configurable in MCM

[size=4][u][b]8) FIGHT SPEED MOD[/b][/u][/size]

- add Scales for Fight speed for player and opponents !
- Just do as you want in MCM Menu, slowing or quickling them.

[u][b][size=4]9) Main Quest Alternativ[/size][/b][/u]

- Add a feature to the Mainquest: You'll need to proof your bravoure to the Greybeards as they will ask you to kill 10 dragons before enter their temple.
 - Before being sacred Dragonborn, you won't be able to use shout, cause recovery is blocked, or very slow.
- Once coming by the greybeards, ask them to receive a spell and amulett.
-> The spell catchs the soul of dead creatures as you fight them and fill the amulett. 
-> Use the amulet to recover Shout, health or magicka.
- Find dragon's heart in killed dragons: this is a gem to enchant weapons and armours.


[size=4][u][b]10) Real CREATURES:[/b][/u]
[/size]
- Change randomly health of the creatures from 50% to 150%.
- Configurable in MCM.

[u][b][size=4]11) Fighting Options[/size][/b][/u]

-> Blocking will be complete, absorbing fast all damages.
-> Adds magic fight effect by non-blocked hit: lightly and soundly one second opponent and you will be paralysed.
-> Effects of heavy and light armours: Armours do now more protect you but will slowing you.
-> Fightspeed: Now depends on your ability corresponding skill value. (example "oneHanded" for one handed weapons)
The more you are high in skill, the quicker you will move your weapons !
-> leveled Material quality for armours and weapons: You will need a level to use quality items as good items are reserved for masters !
All options can be disable or enable in MCM.

[u][b][size=4]12) CLASS and LEVELLING:[/size][/b][/u]

1) Open after intro MCM Menu for class selecting.
2) Choose 7 major skills, enable minor skills or not.
3) Finalise / save:
-> You know have a class !!
Get a skill Point by leveling your major skills.
Getting a new level for the player will NOT give you a skill point ANYMORE.
-> Buy skillbooks by merchants to get extra skill points.

[size=4][u][b]13) HORSES[/b][/u]
[/size]
- Horses are different in price and speed.
- Try a horse before buying: Ask at stables for this.
-Feed your horse or he will go slow!

[b][u][size=4]14) HUNTING[/size][/u][/b]

-lOOTING ANIMALS has to be learned. Buy learn books in hunting bar in whiterun.
Before learning you 'll not be able to loot animals killed !

[b][u][size=4]15) Camera
[/size][/u][/b]
- Automaticly change camera in first person view as you equip magic spell or bow or twice. Returns for weapons in third person view.
- can be changed in MCM Menu.

[b][u][size=4]16) Thirst-Hunger-Sleep
[/size][/u][/b]
- Manage thirst, Hunger, Sleep needs.
- As vampire= no needs.
- Your needs will be displayed on top corner left using little graphic phrase like [======      ].
- Build and use sleeping bags 
  To use it, throw from inventory, and it will be ready in front of you.
- Drink and eat are now with animations.
  While fighting, the animation could be a problem: "slayed while slowly drinking potions" so i add a slowing time effect while fighting, opponents move and fight much slower while you drink.
- add a woodcutter gameplay:
  hit with woodcutter's axe on trees or vanilla firewood. You will get "kindling firewood" pieces. 
  Place 5 "kindling firewood" pieces. And throw a few seconds Flame spell on all them:
  A real fire camp will be created. Use it to cook meat.
  This runs only with "kindling firewood" pieces.

[b][u][size=4]17) ARENA:
[/size][/u][/b]
Discover the arena of Windhelm.
When you leave the town after the bridge, walk on left the road. After the first farm on your right, go the little way on the Hill to the Hunter's camp, walk through the camp on east, and you'll see the arena.
Bet on fights, choose the winner, see the two teams fighting, and earn septims, or try to fight yourself selecting many creatures from Skyrim, and how many of them you want to fight with.
Speak to the arena masters for all this.

[b][u][size=4]18) OUTFIT-RPG
[/size][/u][/b]
If you want to disguise yourself as Forsworn and walk free under them, visit a necromancer castle without fighting. Or just play the game as bandit. Or wish imperials to attack if you walk as stormcloak, well, this feature is for you:

Then now equip the outfit of a faction to join it with appropriate reactions of the faction's friends and enemies.
So don't run as imperial in Windhelm or you will be attacked !
Factions concerned: Bandit, forsworn, imperial, stormcloak, thalmor and warlocks.
Just equip the cuirass or robe representing the faction + 2 items minimum of an outfit to be recognized as a member of the group.
(warlock: the robe is enough)
Changing a group membership will be signalized with a sound.

Think to be hidden if you want to change your outfit !
See MCM for options.

[b][u][size=4]19) MORE WORLD INTERACTIONS:
[/size][/u][/b]
- Summons more stormcloak vs imperial little battles in the world.
- MCM: Configure how much fighters, and how often they should appear. But think about your PC capacity while selecting this ! 

[b][u][size=4]20) Commerce difficile
[/size][/u][/b]
- Merchants give you less septims when you sell items. That's for not becoming too rich too quickly in the game, making the game nonsense.



ENJOY IT,
[u]Marcoousik[/u]




[/size]



[/center]
author: Marcoousik
